name: Bash-Bots
description:
Welcome to Bash-Bots!

Developed as part of coursework. Bash-Bots is a mini single screen multiplayer game inspired by robot combat TV shows like Robot Wars and Battlebots. Players can use one of four bots, inspired by star contenders of the shows, in an arena deathmatch mode. Victory is achieved by ejecting an opponent from the arena or disabling them by reducing their HP to 0.

Thanks for playing! If you identify any bugs or issues please let me know.
